channel.title: Mrquarter
channel.description:
Just wondering, why was he unbanned? I remember him bragging about it to me a long while ago, but though nothing of it. You know the reason he was banned, correct? For those of you who don't.. he 'hacked' me.
Just wondering why the ban was lifted. No biggy, I suppose. Pretty old "topic" but.. Yeah.
Oh, and hi all :)

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Mrquarter has been banned again, for reasons mentioned in a previous post. There’s no need for this discussion to continue. Those reasons being that he was attacking servers, among other things.

Read full topic

item.description:

Mrq attacked servers one time yesterday to show how bad the security of servers is.

Is that not what the people did last time?

And I’m almost sure he is using the program I and Aftermath wrote…

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Thats why I said

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:16, topic:148710”]I don’t care.[/quote]
Hes learning from it, no need to crash yup.
The old Mr is back.
Keep your eyes open, he is trying to post his crasher on sites.
While ago he posted it on rune-server but it got removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:16, topic:148710”]Ok.
But I’m not sure about it yet.
Mrq attacked servers one time yesterday to show how bad the security of servers is.

Anyways,
I don’t care.[/quote]
I only “attacked servers one time”, and got banned for it but MrQuarter attacked many servers yesterday.
Anyway, i can’t be fucked getting involved in another e-drama.

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:16, topic:148710”]Ok.
But I’m not sure about it yet.
Mrq attacked servers one time yesterday to show how bad the security of servers is.

Anyways,
I don’t care.[/quote]
And I’m sure people are very grateful for all of the unsolicited ‘penetration testing’ help that he has given them.

He’s a skiddy, but I’ll give you a quick lesson anyway:
When black hats (bad hackers) find bugs, they write an exploit and keep their mouth shut.
When a white hat (a good hacker) finds such a problem, they report it to the creators of the software so it can be patched, or better yet, they submit a patch along with the report.

While mrquarter was making out that he wanted to help people, he certainly wasn’t the latter of those two types of hackers - there has been no topic to patch the problem he has found, and there wasn’t going to be one from him.
The only thing he was doing was laughing and acting like a dickhead.

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ok.
But I’m not sure about it yet.
Mrq attacked servers one time yesterday to show how bad the security of servers is.

Anyways,
I don’t care.

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Well I guess nobody has to worry anymore - he decided to go around attacking servers with some software.
Not only did he admit to it, but he posted a picture of the program he was using; it obviously wasn’t his, so this forum is now home to one less skiddy. Anyway if thug life got banned for attacking servers, then someone like mrquarter should definitely be banned for doing so.

Taking into account this topic, mopar’s last ban message (which was related to this incident mentioned by dcthug), and the various complaints from section mods about him advertising, I’ve made the ban permanent.

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

frank_:

i gave the client someone who gave it to him, he then posted it without my concent, though i didnt say anything because it suited me he took all credit for the edited client, too

Yeah, yet another example as to why he should still be banned, no?

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

93dcthugs93:

Well using that excuse is sort of a cop-out, no? Him victimized? that’s absurd. I’m sorry I’m so special and he’s not.

Only as absurd as you being victimised when he managed to somehow get into your account. =\

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

The reality is that he himself was victimised in a sense. He was offered something, and all he probably saw was the rep that’d soon be coming his way. Even if he did suspect foul play going on, he certainly wasn’t proficient enough to check it and find out for himself. Mind you, there’d be a few key objects used, like URL for example, seeing as it connected to a php page.
However, having said that, I don’t exactly endorse the unbanning of silly people.

Read full topic
